name: Bamboo Cutlery Set
description: Ditch single-use plastics with this stylish and durable bamboo cutlery set. Includes fork, knife, spoon, chopsticks, and a cleaning brush in a convenient travel pouch.

name: Reusable Beeswax Wraps (3-Pack)
description: A natural and reusable alternative to plastic wrap. Perfect for covering bowls, wrapping sandwiches, and storing food. Made from organic cotton and beeswax.

name: Solar-Powered Phone Charger
description: Harness the power of the sun to charge your devices on the go. Compact, lightweight, and perfect for hiking, camping, or emergencies.

name: LED Smart Bulbs (4-Pack)
description: Upgrade your home with these energy-efficient smart bulbs. Control brightness and color from your phone, and save up to 80% on lighting costs.

name: Water-Saving Showerhead
description: Reduce your water consumption without sacrificing pressure. This showerhead uses atomization technology to save up to 70% of water.

name: Kitchen Compost Bin (5L)
description: A sleek and odorless solution for your kitchen scraps. This countertop compost bin makes it easy to turn food waste into nutrient-rich soil for your garden.

name: Recycled Paper Notebook Set
description: Jot down your ideas on paper that’s kind to the planet. This set of three notebooks is made from 100% post-consumer recycled paper.

name: Plant-Based Cleaning Kit
description: A complete set of non-toxic, plant-based cleaning supplies for your entire home. Powerful on grime, gentle on the environment.

name: Wool Dryer Balls (6-Pack)
description: A natural fabric softener that reduces drying time, static, and wrinkles. Reusable for over 1,000 loads, replacing disposable dryer sheets.

name: Stainless Steel Reusable Straws
description: Set of 4 stainless steel straws with a cleaning brush and travel pouch. A simple switch to reduce plastic waste.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Learns your schedule and preferences to automatically adjust your home’s temperature, saving energy and money without sacrificing comfort.

name: Electric Kitchen Composter
description: Turn your food scraps into ready-to-use compost in a matter of hours, not weeks. This electric composter dries, grinds, and cools waste with the push of a button.

name: Portable Solar Panel (100W)
description: A foldable and powerful 100W solar panel for charging power stations and electronics during camping, RV trips, or power outages.

name: Indoor Air Quality Monitor
description: Track key air quality metrics like PM2.5, CO2, humidity, and temperature in your home to ensure you’re breathing clean, healthy air.

name: High-Efficiency Air Purifier
description: Captures 99.97% of airborne pollutants like dust, pollen, smoke, and pet dander. Features a washable pre-filter and a true HEPA filter.

name: Organic Cotton Mesh Produce Bags
description: Set of 5 reusable mesh bags for fruits and vegetables. Lightweight, durable, and machine washable.

name: Solid Shampoo & Conditioner Bars
description: Ditch the plastic bottles with these concentrated shampoo and conditioner bars. Lasts for up to 80 washes.

name: Bamboo Toothbrush (4-Pack)
description: A biodegradable alternative to plastic toothbrushes. Made from sustainably sourced bamboo with charcoal-infused bristles.

name: Reusable Coffee Cup
description: A stylish, insulated coffee cup made from recycled materials. Keep your drink hot and reduce waste from disposable cups.

name: Energy Monitoring Smart Plugs (2-Pack)
description: Monitor and control your home appliances from your phone. Set schedules and track energy usage to reduce your electricity bill.
